FAQ

What is the recommended attire for the Summit?

There is no dress code for the Summit. Perhaps visiting Houston is your chance to break out shorts, or perhaps now is the time for you to channel your inner Wonder Kid. To cultivate a more sociable atmosphere on the first day of the Summit, Friday is jersey day! Participants are encouraged (but not required) to wear their favorite soccer jerseys on Friday.
